price: Shin, fa, wanda yake sanin cẽwa lalle abin da aka saukar zuwa gare ka daga Ubangijinka ne gaskiya yanã zama kamar wanda yake makãho? Abin sani kawai masu hankali sũ ke yin tunãni.
arabic: ۞ أَفَمَن يَعۡلَمُ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ كَمَنۡ هُوَ أَعۡمَىٰٓۚ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaman yaʿlamu annamā unzila ilayka min rabbika al-ḥaqu kaman huwa aʿmā innamā yatadhakkaru ulū al-albābi
